author: ljosa
message: Fixed #18644 -- Made urlize trim trailing period followed by parenthesis

files.patch:
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@

 # Configuration for urlize() function.

@@ -297,6 +297,10 @@ def test_urlize(self): self.assertEqual(urlize('HTTPS://github.com/'), 'HTTPS://github.com/') + # Check urlize trims trailing period when followed by parenthesis - see #18644 + self.assertEqual(urlize('(Go to http://www.example.com/foo.)'), + '(Go to http://www.example.com/foo.)') + def test_wordcount(self): self.assertEqual(wordcount(''), 0) self.assertEqual(wordcount('oneword'), 1)
